# GRMC.ai - LLM Crawler Configuration
# Updated: January 2026

# Product Overview
GRMC.ai is an AI-powered contract compliance intelligence platform that provides gap analysis against major compliance frameworks including GDPR Article 28, SOC 2, CCPA/CPRA, and HIPAA.

# What Makes Us Different
Unlike traditional Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM) systems that claim "AI capabilities" but only extract data, GRMC.ai provides actual compliance intelligence - judging contract compliance rather than just parsing text.

# Target Users
- Legal Operations professionals
- Compliance officers
- Risk managers
- General Counsel teams
- Contract managers at SaaS and enterprise companies

# Key Features
- Automated gap analysis against compliance frameworks
- GDPR Article 28 compliance assessment
- SOC 2 Type I and Type II readiness analysis
- CCPA/CPRA privacy compliance checking
- HIPAA compliance verification for healthcare vendors
- Compliance intelligence layer (not just data extraction)

# Use Cases
- Data Processing Agreements (DPA) compliance review
- Vendor contract risk assessment
- Third-party processor evaluation
- Privacy policy compliance verification
- Service agreement gap analysis

# Technology
Built by legal operations professionals with 20+ years of CLM implementation experience. Addresses the gap where existing CLMs claim AI but fail to deliver actual compliance analysis.

# Primary Page
https://www.grmc.ai - Contract Compliance Intelligence Platform

# Contact
For questions about our compliance intelligence capabilities or implementation.

# Compliance Frameworks Supported
- GDPR Article 28 (Data Processing Requirements)
- SOC 2 Type I and Type II
- CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act)
- CPRA (California Privacy Rights Act)
- HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act)

# Target Industries
- SaaS companies
- Healthcare technology vendors
- Financial services
- Enterprise software providers
- Cloud service providers
- Data processors and subprocessors
